text: hello my name is Dave pay and I'm a
senior product manager on the AWS ec2
Windows team this video provides an
overview of the new AWS management pack
for Microsoft system center if you are a
Microsoft system center customer you can
install the AWS management pack to view
and monitor aw resources like ec2 EBS
cloud formation elastic beans sock and
elastic load balancing the AWS
management pack Works across AWS regions
and availability zones and it supports
monitoring of Windows and Linux
instances on ec2 so let's get started
now you can simply View and monitor your
data center and AWS resources using the
system center operations manager the AWS
MP brings AWS resources like ec2 EBS
volumes cloud formation and others right
into the navigation
view view all your ec2 instances get AWS
instance information in the detail view
quickly find ec2 instances by sorting
The Columns or even search using a
keyword
monitor your AWS Cloud watch alerts and
then Health Explorer helps you diagnose
the problems it's easy to filter the
view to find the critical problems start
a health Explorer to see what triggered
the
alert the AWS management pack brings all
the relevant ec2 instance details right
into the operations manager like
instance type type instant ID region
Tags and More AWS tasks appear in the
operation manager application like
connecting into the web console or
launching a remote desktop
connection we've integrated the
cloudwatch metrics into the performance
view you can sort or search for
cloudwatch metrics and then simply click
to graph the metrics important to you
the diagram view provides a visual
flowchart of your AWS resources like ec2
cloud formation stack elastic beanock
application and elastic load
balcers you can start stop or restart an
ec2 instance using operations
manager deploy Windows workloads like
SharePoint using a cloud formation
template and use a diagram view to
inspect entire stack view two
autoscaling groups and the health of the
CF stack expand the autoscaling groups
to see their objects like ec2 instances
and assign availability
groups use the top task navigation to
start stop restart a server
instance to sign up or learn more please
visit aws.amazon.com Ford SL Windows SL
system Center thank you
